publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2720 Kay Ullrich: Ayr United Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Ayr United Football Club on the magnificent achievement of reaching the CIS Insurance Cup Final and wishes the "Honest Men" continued success in the tournament.

S1M-2720 Kay Ullrich: Ayr United Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Ayr United Football Club on the magnificent achievement of reaching the CIS Insurance Cup Final and wishes the "Honest Men" continued success in the tournament. Supported by: John Scott*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2720 Ayr United Football Club (lodged on 7 February 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2720 Ayr United Football Club (lodged on 7 February 2002) Phil Gallie*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2720 Ayr United Football Club (lodged on 7 February 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2720 Ayr United Football Club (lodged on 7 February 2002) Mr Keith Harding*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2720 Ayr United Football Club (lodged on 7 February 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
